openstack_lb_pool_v1.description: Manages a V1 load balancer pool resource within OpenStack.

region.description: The region in which to obtain the V2 Networking client.

name.description: The name of the pool. Changing this updates the name of

protocol.description: The protocol used by the pool members, you can use

subnet_id.description: The network on which the members of the pool will be

lb_method.description: The algorithm used to distribute load between the

lb_provider.description: The backend load balancing provider. For example:

tenant_id.description: The owner of the member. Required if admin wants to

monitor_ids.description: A list of IDs of monitors to associate with the

member.description: An existing node to add to the pool. Changing this

address.description: The IP address of the member. Changing this creates a

port.description: An integer representing the port on which the member is

admin_state_up.description: The administrative state of the member.
